description: Returns a list of SourceCredentialsInfo objects.

nested_items.name: sourceCredentialsInfos
nested_items.description: A list of SourceCredentialsInfo objects. Each SourceCredentialsInfo object includes the authentication type, token ARN, and type of source provider for one set of credentials.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the token.

nested_items.name: serverType
nested_items.description: The type of source provider. The valid options are GITHUB, GITHUB_ENTERPRISE, GITLAB, GITLAB_SELF_MANAGED, or BITBUCKET.

nested_items.name: authType
nested_items.description: The type of authentication used by the credentials. Valid options are OAUTH, BASIC_AUTH, PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN, CODECONNECTIONS, or SECRETS_MANAGER.

nested_items.name: resource
nested_items.description: The connection ARN if your authType is CODECONNECTIONS or SECRETS_MANAGER.
